## Glas Tulaichean & Càrn an Rìgh Hiking Trip from Spittal of Glenshee

Join us for a breathtaking summer hiking adventure as we summit two iconic Munros, Glas Tulaichean (1,051 m / 3,448 ft)** and Càrn an Rìgh (1,029 m / 3,376 ft) both in the heart of the scenic Glenshee Highlands.

## 🗓️ Date
**Saturday, 21st June 2025**

## 📍 Location
**Meeting Point:** Usher Hall, Edinburgh  
**Time:** Departure at 9:30 AM sharp

## 🥾 Hike Overview

- **Distance:** ~19 km (loop)
- **Elevation Gain:** ~1,100 meters
- **Difficulty:** Moderate to Strenuous
- **Duration:** 6–7 hours (including breaks)

## 🎒 What to Bring

- Good hiking boots
- Waterproof layers
- Packed lunch and water
- Sun protection
- A positive spirit!

## 🚗 Travel
Carpooling options may be available. Please indicate in the sign-up form if you can offer or need a lift.

## 📝 Register

If you plan to attend, please [contact us](mailto:info@kenyancommunityinscotland.uk) or [fill out the Volunteer form](../volunteer.qmd) and mention the event in the message.

---

We look forward to sharing the trail with you!
